name: Marshmallo
description:
This is a game inspired by my own marshmallow roasting excursions that explores storytelling methods in games. Control the marshmallow with the mouse, and avoid the wind! Everything should be explained in game.

This game does actually have an ending. It doesn't take too long to get there.

The original was made for Unhackathon in 36 hours, and can be found here.

a game by Aaron Santiago
